text: E. M. "Buddy" Childers (born October 17, 1938) is a retired American politician in the state of Georgia. Childers served in the United States Marine Corps Reserve and graduated from Model high school in Rome, Georgia. He later owned a telecommunications company.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/7863/e-m- childers#.VGKpPfTF_Zk Childers served in the Georgia House of Representatives from district 15 as a Democrat from 1974 to 2004.http://www.northwestgeorgianews.com/childers-years-going-to-bat-for-nw- georgi-local- new/article_a33f7ac8-f4f9-50ea-8ab8-4bf8804934bd.htmlhttps://news.google.com/newspapers?nid=348&dat;=19740901&id;=SPpMAAAAIBAJ&sjid;=LjMDAAAAIBAJ&pg;=3834,75779 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Georgia House of Representatives Category:Georgia (U.S. state) Democrats
title: Buddy Childers (politician)
